off-icon.description: The icon displayed when the screensaver is enabled:
off-icon.tooltip: Select an icon file, or you can type an icon name into the entry box

on-icon.description: The icon displayed when the screensaver is disabled:
on-icon.tooltip: Select an icon file, or you can type an icon name into the entry box

keybinding.description: Set the keybinding used to toggle the screensaver inhibit
